name: memento
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
an object that you keep to remember a person, place, or event: I kept a seashell as a memento of our holiday. Synonym
souvenir
SMART Vocabulary: related words and phrases
Remembering, reminding and reminders
aide-mémoire

awaken someone to something
be engraved on someone's memory/mind idiom
be etched on/in someone's memory idiom
commit
hooky
if my memory serves me right idiom

indelible

jog someone's memory idiom
remind
remind someone of something/someone
reminder
reminisce
reminiscence

Add to word list
an object that you keep to help you remember a person or a special event: The bracelet is a memento from her college sweetheart.
